ingredients: 3/4 pound ziti rigate, whole wheat ziti or any other short-cut pasta
4 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
1 bunch cavolo nero (also called tuscan kale, dinosaur kale or lacinato kale), stemmed and very thinly sliced
1 cup fresh ricotta or sheeps-milk ricotta cheese
1 28 ounce can italian tomatoes in puree
A few leaves fresh basil, torn
8 ounces thinly sliced fresh mozzarella or shredded mozzarella cheese
